bow2018.description: Pour 2018 vos meetups se réunissent pour organiser une journée sur le thème du Best Of des talks de l'année. Nous vous proposons un mixte des meilleurs conférences, de nouveaux sujets et pleins de surprises...
bow2018.name: Best Of Web 2018

speakers.name: Gerard Sans
speakers.bio: Gerard is very excited about the future of the Web and JavaScript. Always happy Computer Science Engineer and humble Google Developer Expert. He loves to share his learnings by giving talks, trainings and writing about cool technologies. He loves running AngularZone and GraphQL London, mentoring students and giving back to the community.

speakers.name: Maxim Salnikov
speakers.bio:
Maxim Salnikov is Oslo-based Web UI Engineer, a Google Developer Expert in Web Technologies and Angular. He develops complex web applications since the end of the last century and has extensive experience with all aspects of web front-end: UX/UI prototyping, HTML/CSS/JS, main frameworks, progressive web apps.

Maxim is a founder and active contributor to two conferences: Mobile Era and ngVikings - Nordics’ main conferences for mobile and Angular developers respectively. Also, he leads Norway’s l

speakers.name: AMahdy Abdelaziz
speakers.bio: International technical speaker, Google developer expert (GDE), trainer and developer advocate. Passionate about Web and Mobile apps development, including PWA, offline-first design, in-browser database, and cross platform tools. Also interested in Android internals such as building custom ROMs and customize AOSP for embedded devices. www.amahdy.net

speakers.name: Xavier Detant
speakers.bio: Développeur passionné, CTO @ Zenika, co-organisateur des meetups "software crafters paris", "dojo développement paris" et d'autres.

speakers.name: Jean-François Garreau
speakers.bio:
GDE Web Technology, je travaille pour Lucca en tant que responsable des composants des produits.

En dehors du travail, je suis co-fondateur du GDG Nantes, organisateur du DevFest Nantes, co-créateur des Nantes Wit et organisateur de Devoxx4Kids

Retrouvez l'ensemble de mes contributions sur https://github.com/jefBinomed

speakers.name: Alyssa Nicoll
speakers.bio: I'm an Angular Developer Advocate & GDE. My two degrees (Web Design & Development and Psychology) feed my speaking career. I’ve spoken at over 20 conferences Internationally, specialising in motivational soft talks. I'm a weekly panelist on Adventures in Angular and Angular Air, which have a combined following of over 16,000 listeners. I enjoy gaming, scuba diving, and have a toothless dog named Gummy. My DM is always open, come talk sometime.

speakers.name: Loïc Knuchel
speakers.bio:
Développeur Scala chez Criteo et formateur indépendant. Fan de programmation fonctionnelle typée mais aussi conférencier, organisateur de meetup et ancien freelance et fondateur de startup.
Ouvert à toute discussion sur la qualité de code, la programmation fonctionnelle, DDD, TDD, l’event sourcing ainsi que l’agilité, le management ou le recrutement ;)

speakers.name: Alexis Hassler
speakers.bio: Alexis Hassler est développeur Java depuis la fin du siècle dernier. Il exerce son métier comme indépendant, en codant, mais aussi en accompagnant ou formant les entreprises pour les aider à améliorer leur façon de développer et de déployer leurs applications Java.

speakers.name: Cédric Ravalec
speakers.bio: Embedded & IoT Business Line Manager

speakers.name: Victor Viale
speakers.bio: Ancien étudiant à l'IMAC, gentil, attentionné, doux, un peu niais et surtout j'aime le houmous. Développeur front-end pour @mfg_labs

speakers.name: Caroline Besnard
speakers.bio: Digital enthusiast I love solving problems. By working closely with potential users I therefore create easy to use products with great user experience.

speakers.name: Héloïse Bonan
speakers.bio: UX Designer & Scrum Master chez BAM

speakers.name: Thomas Crevoisier
speakers.bio: Music Computing Lab, The Open University   Ecole Centrale Nantes....

speakers.name: Vincent Vallet
speakers.bio: Dev full stack Js, NodeJs Evangelist, Lead tech Keymetrics

speakers.name: Michel Parreno
speakers.bio: IT Engineer - Downloading opportunities in Paris. BNP Paribas Investment Partners

speakers.name: Dustin Coates
speakers.bio: I’m a Paris-based programmer working largely in JavaScript, Ruby, and Rails. I’m at Algolia, and was previously creator of Pico, which provides teams the tools to better track their indiviudal career growth goals. I work in voice interface, particularly for the Alexa Skills Kit and Google Assistant, a lot.

speakers.name: David Nowinsky
speakers.bio: Dev & entrepreneur @Toucan_Toco, tech-hippie by night

speakers.name: Aurore Malherbes
speakers.bio: Mobile engineer @bam_lab

speakers.name: Morgan Kobeissi
speakers.bio: Full Stack Developer, Pragmatic Coach, Hip Hop artist, French of Lebanese origin, raised in Nigeria, currently residing in Paris, France. R&D @ Murex S.A.S.

speakers.name: Sébastien Chopin
speakers.bio: Author of @nuxt_js & @terra_js • Community partner of @vuejs • Working on @cmty_io

speakers.name: Mathieu Breton
speakers.bio: Co-Founder & CTO at @jsrepublic

speakers.name: Michael Romain
speakers.bio: ReactJS french web developer, singer-songwriter based in the Paris suburb. I let myself guided by stoic guys like Epictetus, Marcus-Aurelius and Seneca.

speakers.name: Wassim Chegham
speakers.bio: ▶︎Advocate for Developers & #OSS◀︎ Sr. Engineer @SFEIR • GDE for the @angular @actionsongoogle @googlecloud teams • Member of the @nodejs Foundation • DMs open.

speakers.name: Guillaume Laforge
speakers.bio: Developer Advocate at @Google for @GoogleCloud during the day, and @ApacheGroovy programming language project PMC Chair & @java_champions at night

speakers.name: Wolfgang Goedel
speakers.bio: @wgoedel

speakers.name: Rudy Weber
speakers.bio: @rudy_weber

speakers.name: Fabien Zibi
speakers.bio: Tech Lead Front @sfeir

slots.title: Chatbots, et si on passait la seconde ?
Tame your Service Worker before your Progressive Web App go into the wild
How to distinguish PWA's UX from WEB app's UX
Comprendre la stratégie de Google avec les PWA
Réalité virtuelle avec VueJS et A-Frame
De Javascript à Haskell : La programmation fonctionnelle expliquée simplement
De développeur web à artiste du cerveau
Bending time with Schedulers and RxJS 5
Les scripts npm et la sécurité
Innovating is not about technology, but psychology.
Mutation testing, enfin une bonne mesure de la qualité des tests ?
Alexa, show me a good voice UI
